entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • new List<T>(IEnumrable<T>) & List<T>.AddRange(IEnumerable<T>) doesn't use IIListProvider. #98835
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Warn on use of StreamReader.EndOfStream in async methods #98834
  • [API Proposal]: : AVX-IFMA Intrinsics #98833
  • [MT][browser] MutexTests.AbandonExisting #98830
    9.0.0
  • [browser][wbt] RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations #98828
    9.0.0
  • Address high-severity vulnerability CVE-2023-29331 in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml 6.0.1 and 7.0.1 #98827
  • PublishAot fails with CodeGenerationFailedException/InvalidOperationException at TypeSystemHelpers.ContainsSignatureVariables #98821
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `AVX512 FP16` and `AVX` `F16C` ISA #98820
  • mono: Implement support for generic unmanaged calli #98819
    9.0.0
  • Strange behavior of the application regarding it's locale #98818
  • profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd failing on windows arm64 #98817
  • Question about exception handling #98815
  • BitArray.CopyTo(Array, int) throws an ArgumentException, if BitArray.Length has been reduced to a multiple of 32 #98813
    Future
  • XDocument parses strings with ASCII HTML number to ASCII Symbol #98810
  • ReadOnly Attribute on Directory results in AccessDenied-Exception #98807
  • [mono] expression Cannot box IsByRefLike type 'System.ReadOnlySpan`1' #98805
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] PlatformNotSupportedException Blocking wait is not supported on the JS interop threads #98804
    9.0.0
  • SPMI: Add metrics to the asmdiffs report #98800
    9.0.0
  • SPMI: Also display perfscore improvements/regressions separately #98799
    9.0.0
  • Failed to setup SSL connection with .NET8 Linux-Container Image with failure "Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream" #98797
  • Access to the path '' is denied #98796
  • PersianCalendarTests.IsLeapYear failing #98795
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for UInt128 type to IPAddress class. #98792
    Future
  • Slower IDispatch calls in compare to .NET Framework. #98788
  • Test failure: profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd #98787
  • [8.0] Stream aborted by peer (268) in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #98786
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Unmanaged calli not supported with generic arguments #9136
    9.0.0
  • Diff in checked vs. release #98772
    9.0.0
  • Dependency Name does not contain 'Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.' error in source build leg #98822
  • Unable to profile Mac Catalyst apps with `dotnet trace` #96970
  • DesignerAttribute/EditorAttribute size implications #92043
    Future
  • [mono] mono_thread_detach hit assert #98751
  • dotnet CLI commands no longer work in .NET 7/8 with detached console #98441
  • System.Runtime.Caching MemoryCache.CacheMemoryLimit on macos number seems not correct. #98793

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not crash on a never true `typeof(T) == typeof(Gen<>)` #98836
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add encodings FL_3A to FX_3A #98832
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass for NativeAOT #98831
  • [release/8.0-staging] Restore erroneously removed encoding of the argument count in a generic method instantiation #98825
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Set assets manifest metadata for assets that get shipped with .NET release #98824
  • Add missing "internal use" for register created for LoadAndInsertScalar() #98814
  • Replace unaligned casts in Buffer.Memmove #98812
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update DiagnosticSourceUsersGuide.md #98801
  • [RISC-V] Use getUnrollThreshold() to get unroll limits #98798
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator for IgnoreCase multi-strings #98791
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Interface maps' TargetMethods array should only contain generic method definitions, not instances #98790
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

Merged

  • Detect CPUs with throttled 512-bit width instructions #98806
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_BI_2A` to `SVE_HF_2A` #98784
    arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Invalidate m_switchDescMap instead of updating it #98789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add back optimization of Encode using arm64 load/store/vectortablelookup #98719
    needs-area-label
  • Restore erroneously removed encoding of the argument count in a generic method instantiation #98731
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98665
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: fix issue runing RLCSE in release #98785
  • Fix VS debugger tests issues #98783
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Check DivideByZeroException before generating check for unsigned div/mod #98648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove bash dep from init scripts #98781
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Log ManagedThreadId and NativeThreadId for known test failures #98291
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • #98441 - Ignore invalid handle/access when setting console cp #98641
    area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy thread #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add missing type name parsing test coverage #98562
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Don't allow relink duplicates of `dotnet.native.worker.js` #98487
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • SPMI: Handle PerfScore=0 edge case #98775
  • Add correct ImplementingType and InterfaceImpl to DIM cache in TypeMapInfo #98513
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0] Bump NuGet.ProjectModel version #98724
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #98456
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #98455
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #98454
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Updated

  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add info in docs about diagnosing Build Analysis failures #98778
  • XUnitLogChecker: Ensure missing stack frames are resolved on Windows using dotnet-sos #98397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Add backtracking stack imbalance detection to regex source generator #98472
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Ensuring XUnitLogChecker is included in libraries outerloop #97135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Cache the InterfaceImplementation for the concrete type that requires the DIM to be kept in DefaultInterfaceImplementations cache #98782
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Intrinsify ClearWithoutReferences and Fill #98700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add analyzer support for feature guards #94944
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: test the new cse policy in jit-experimental #98777
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Add "driver" support to Mono AOT cross compiler. #97226
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Fix ValueType.GetHashCode not calling overriden method on nested field #98754
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • datas tuning fix #98743
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][mt] Guard more places for blocking wait on JS interop threads #98508
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CW_4A #98762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME in objectnative.cpp to QCall #97641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #98661
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the assertion error for DynamicHelpers::CreateDictionaryLookupHelper(). #98741
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors of the struct argument parsing in LoongArch64PassStructInRegister.cs #98744
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
